795 01:12:28,970 --> 01:12:31,240 - 谁看见的？ - 她女儿 - Who saw us? - Her daughter.
796 01:12:31,440 --> 01:12:33,540 你把那称为顺从？ You call that resignation?
797 01:12:33,640 --> 01:12:37,170 居然强迫一位母亲把她儿子的重要遗物烧了 Forcing a mother to burn the one relic of her dead child.
798 01:12:37,380 --> 01:12:41,150 简直像《旧约》里的故事！ It's like a story from the Old Testament!
799 01:12:41,290 --> 01:12:43,550 还说什么永远的分离！ And to speak of eternal separation!
800 01:12:44,220 --> 01:12:46,660 人不该这样要挟他人的灵魂 孩子 One doesn't blackmail souls, my child.
801 01:12:48,090 --> 01:12:51,150 那是您所认为的事情版本 我可以告诉您另一种 That's your version of what happened. I could tell a different one.
802 01:12:52,430 --> 01:12:53,990 不过这也基本上没错 But it's essentially true.
803 01:12:54,100 --> 01:12:56,070 难道你没有别的要说吗？ Is that all you can say?
804 01:12:57,130 --> 01:12:58,570 是的 Yes.
805 01:13:04,580 --> 01:13:07,510 不管发生什么事 不要再见那个女儿了 她是个魔鬼！ Whatever happens, don't see the daughter again. She's a demon!
806 01:13:11,220 --> 01:13:13,380 我不会向她关上门的 I won't close my door to her.
807 01:13:15,190 --> 01:13:18,710 只要我还在这里做神父 就不会向任何人关上门 I'll close my door to no one while I am the priest here.
808 01:13:18,820 --> 01:13:21,260 她声称她母亲跟你抗争到底 She claims her mother fought you to the last,
809 01:13:21,460 --> 01:13:24,450 而你在她悲伤和心神错乱之时离开了 and that you left her upset and spiritually distraught.
810 01:13:24,560 --> 01:13:25,530 那是真的吗？ Is that true?
811 01:13:26,560 --> 01:13:27,630 不是 No.
812 01:13:28,630 --> 01:13:29,890 你离开时…… You left her -
813 01:13:30,000 --> 01:13:31,930 我离开时将她转交给了上帝 I left her with God.
814 01:13:32,040 --> 01:13:35,530 你对她的严辞也许让她死时备受折磨 The memory of your harsh words may have tormented her as she died.
815 01:13:38,410 --> 01:13:40,210 她死得非常安详 She died in peace.
816 01:13:41,180 --> 01:13:42,740 你怎么知道？ How would you know?
817 01:13:54,060 --> 01:13:55,620 不管怎样 她已经去世了 In any case, she's dead now.
818 01:13:55,830 --> 01:13:57,590 你还能指望人们怎么想？ What do you expect people to think?
819 01:13:58,460 --> 01:14:00,950 这种场景对心脏有问题的人来说总不是好事 Scenes like that aren't good for someone with heart trouble.
820 01:14:06,670 --> 01:14:09,070 我丝毫没有冲动要提及那封信 I wasn't even tempted to speak of the letter.
821 01:14:09,270 --> 01:14:11,070 我后来回到住所 I returned to the rectory.
822 01:14:13,140 --> 01:14:16,940 我并不痛苦 反而感到如释重负 Instead of suffering, it felt like a great weight had been lifted.
823 01:14:19,020 --> 01:14:22,820 与托西神父的会面就像 That meeting with the priest from Torcy was like a rehearsal
824 01:14:23,020 --> 01:14:26,250 即将与我的领导们会面的一次彩排 for those I was to have very shortly with my superiors.
825 01:14:27,160 --> 01:14:30,350 我发现我竟无话可说 心里说得上有种窃喜 I'd discovered, with something bordering on joy, that I had nothing to say.
826 01:14:32,860 --> 01:14:36,820 有两天时间 我一直担心会因我没做过的事被指责 For two days, I'd feared being accused of something I hadn't done...
827 01:14:38,200 --> 01:14:41,330 而诚实之心会阻止我保持缄默 and honesty would have forbidden me to remain silent.
828 01:14:42,310 --> 01:14:47,110 而如今 我可以让任何人独自评判我的行为 But now, I could let everyone judge my actions for himself.
829 01:14:50,110 --> 01:14:52,100 我还感到十分释然 I was very relieved as well
830 01:14:52,580 --> 01:14:55,880 因为我猜想夏塔尔小姐很可能误会了我 to think Miss Chantal could have been sincerely mistaken
831 01:14:56,350 --> 01:15:00,620 至于我和伯爵夫人的谈话的真正含义 她兴许是听错了 as to the real meaning of our talk, which she may well have misheard.
832 01:15:27,320 --> 01:15:28,650 我可怜的孩子！ My poor child!
833 01:15:29,720 --> 01:15:32,550 原来是这么回事 So that's how it is.
834 01:15:33,420 --> 01:15:36,320 我仍不明白 我什么也不明白 I didn't understand yet. I didn't understand anything.
835 01:15:36,860 --> 01:15:39,290 只是 我方才感受到的奇异的平静 Except that the strange peace I'd just enjoyed
836 01:15:39,500 --> 01:15:41,930 也许是一个新的不幸的预兆 was the harbinger of a new misfortune.
837 01:15:43,000 --> 01:15:45,870 这不是酒 这是剧毒 This isn't wine. It's some monstrous poison.
838 01:15:45,970 --> 01:15:47,770 我只有这个了 It's all I have.
839 01:15:47,870 --> 01:15:49,400 你应该向我开口 You should have asked me.
840 01:15:50,310 --> 01:15:51,600 我发誓 I swear.
841 01:15:51,710 --> 01:15:54,730 住嘴！肚里满是那东西 你没死真是奇迹 Silence! With that stuff inside you, it's a wonder you're not dead.
842 01:15:57,280 --> 01:15:59,510 幸好我过来了 I'm glad I came.
843 01:16:00,000 --> 01:16:01,260 来 坐下 Come, sit down.
844 01:16:01,260 --> 01:16:06,260 不 No.
845 01:16:06,260 --> 01:16:08,720 我的声音在胸中颤抖着 My voice trembled in my chest as it always did
846 01:16:08,830 --> 01:16:11,950 正如每当我内心听到一个声音要求我坚持己见时那样 whenever something inside told me I had to stand my ground.
847 01:16:12,960 --> 01:16:15,560 世上没有任何力量可以让我坐下 No force in the world could have made me sit.
848 01:16:16,030 --> 01:16:18,730 听着 我不是生你的气 Listen, I'm not angry with you,
849 01:16:18,840 --> 01:16:21,460 我也不认为你酗酒 and I don't take you for a drunk.
850 01:16:22,270 --> 01:16:24,870 我们这些地区的乡下人 We country people of these parts
851 01:16:24,980 --> 01:16:27,380 多少都是些酒鬼的后代 are all more or less drunkards' children.
852 01:16:28,210 --> 01:16:31,010 德尔本德早已即时向你指出问题所在了 Delbende put his finger on the trouble right off.
853 01:16:32,050 --> 01:16:34,570 你出生时可是被腌渍在酒精之中的 我可怜的孩子 You were born pickled in the stuff, my poor friend.
854 01:16:35,520 --> 01:16:38,150 我肯定你毫不知情 I'm sure you had no idea.
855 01:16:38,560 --> 01:16:42,080 但你居然渐渐地开始依赖酒了……这都什么酒呀！ But you slowly drifted into expecting from wine - and what wine! -
856 01:16:42,690 --> 01:16:46,630 也许你从中得到过力量与勇气 the strength and courage you might have gotten from a good roast.
857 01:16:47,560 --> 01:16:49,590 提醒一下你 过去的你并没有冒犯上帝 Mind you, you've not been offending God.
858 01:16:50,170 --> 01:16:53,330 但现在你收到警告了 你再这样就是冒犯他了 But now you've been warned, and you'd offend Him now.
859 01:16:53,540 --> 01:16:55,660 我不专心地看着他 I looked at him distractedly.
860 01:16:56,770 --> 01:16:59,000 他是个强壮又踏实的人 He's a strong and steady man.
861 01:16:59,380 --> 01:17:03,040 一个名符其实的上帝的仆人 他同样一直"勇敢地面对它" A true servant of God. He too has faced up to it.
862 01:17:04,310 --> 01:17:07,480 我们仿佛是在互相道别 It was as if we were bidding farewell to each other
863 01:17:07,580 --> 01:17:09,380 在一条隐形大路的两边 across some invisible highway.
864 01:17:09,490 --> 01:17:12,010 首先 你不要再胡思乱想了 Above all, don't let your imagination run away with you.
865 01:17:12,120 --> 01:17:14,920 我只有一句话要说： I've only one thing to say:
866 01:17:15,160 --> 01:17:17,650 不管怎样 你是个很棒的小神父 You are a wonderful little priest in spite of everything.
867 01:17:17,860 --> 01:17:20,330 你对死去的可怜女士丝毫没有恶意…… And with no malice to the poor woman who died -
868 01:17:20,630 --> 01:17:21,860 请不要说了 Please don't.
869 01:17:21,970 --> 01:17:24,260 你说得对 我们不再谈那件事了 You're right. We'll not speak of that.
870 01:17:31,980 --> 01:17:33,640 现在 工作吧 And now, work.
871 01:17:34,540 --> 01:17:37,240 做些小事 日复一日 不要心急 Do little things, from day to day, while you wait.
872 01:17:38,450 --> 01:17:41,910 小事看起来不伟大 但它们能带来平静 Little things don't seem like much, but they bring peace.
873 01:17:43,020 --> 01:17:44,990 还有 尝试祈祷 And try to pray.
874 01:17:45,190 --> 01:17:46,710 坚持祈祷 Persevere.
875 01:17:47,520 --> 01:17:49,290 向圣母祈祷 Pray to the Holy Virgin.
876 01:17:49,560 --> 01:17:52,720 毋庸说 她是人类的慈母 She is, of course, the mother of mankind,
877 01:17:52,830 --> 01:17:54,730 但她也是世界的女儿 but she is also its daughter.
878 01:17:54,830 --> 01:17:57,890 旧世界 恩典未至的世界 The ancient world, the world before grace,
879 01:17:58,100 --> 01:18:00,160 她在这世界的摇篮中被摇晃着 rocked her in its cradle.
880 01:18:00,640 --> 01:18:03,610 多少世纪以来 世界的大手保护着 For centuries its old hands protected
881 01:18:03,840 --> 01:18:06,900 这个了不起的女孩 而世界甚至不曾知道她的名字 the wondrous young girl whose name it didn't even know.
882 01:18:07,940 --> 01:18:10,280 这个小女孩 是天使中的皇后 A little girl, this queen of the angels,
883 01:18:10,980 --> 01:18:13,850 你永远不要忘记 她时至今日仍是 which she still is to this day. Never forget that.
884 01:18:14,050 --> 01:18:15,610 谢谢您 Thank you.
885 01:18:17,650 --> 01:18:19,490 赐我祝福吧 Give me your blessing.
886 01:18:25,260 --> 01:18:28,390 不 今天轮到你了 No, it's your turn today.
887 01:18:54,660 --> 01:18:56,390 给您 神父 Here you are, Father.
888 01:18:56,590 --> 01:18:58,530 不用 谢谢 我没事 No, thanks. Nothing.
889 01:19:00,700 --> 01:19:02,260 会好的 It will pass.
890 01:19:07,240 --> 01:19:09,260 这会让您重新好起来的 This will put you right again.
891 01:19:19,680 --> 01:19:21,150 感觉好点了吗？ Feeling better?
892 01:19:24,120 --> 01:19:27,420 好多了 谢谢你 Much better, thank you.
893 01:20:06,800 --> 01:20:08,530 我早该回家了 I should have gone home.
894 01:20:09,130 --> 01:20:12,800 我的胃没那么疼了 只是感到有些晕眩 My stomach hurt less. I just felt a slight dizziness.
895 01:20:58,520 --> 01:21:01,970 我的第一回晕倒肯定是在奥西树林外 I must have fainted the first time beyond the Auchy woods.
896 01:21:03,090 --> 01:21:05,550 我当时以为我依然站着挣扎行进 I thought I was still struggling upright,
897 01:21:05,920 --> 01:21:09,090 然而我已经感到脸颊接触的冰冷的泥土 and yet I could feel the frozen earth against my cheek.
898 01:21:10,090 --> 01:21:14,120 "他们会发现半死不活的我" 我想 又一件丑事(要流传开了) "They'll find me half dead, " I thought. Yet another scandal.
899 01:21:15,570 --> 01:21:17,400 我认为我呼喊出声了 I think I called out.
900 01:21:25,580 --> 01:21:27,770 我可怜的脑袋已经无法再忍受了 My poor head couldn't stand it anymore.
901 01:21:29,110 --> 01:21:32,340 托西神父所描绘的圣母形象 The image of the Holy Virgin as described by the priest
902 01:21:32,550 --> 01:21:34,480 不断出现在我面前 was constantly before me.
903 01:21:37,220 --> 01:21:40,520 一位崇高的生灵 她的双手…… A sublime creature. Her hands -
904 01:21:40,720 --> 01:21:42,420 我紧盯她的双手 I stared at her hands.
905 01:21:43,490 --> 01:21:46,620 这一瞬我将看见它们 这一瞬它们将消失 Now I'd see them, now they'd disappear.
906 01:21:48,200 --> 01:21:50,260 随着我的痛苦上升到极点 As my pain grew more extreme,
907 01:21:50,470 --> 01:21:52,530 我抓住其中一只手 紧握着 I took one of them in mine.
908 01:21:54,140 --> 01:21:56,260 那是一只属于贫苦孩子的手 It was the hand of a poor child,
909 01:21:56,470 --> 01:21:59,100 已被重活与洗刷活磨得粗糙 already roughened by hard work and washing.
910 01:22:00,980 --> 01:22:02,640 我闭上了眼睛 I closed my eyes.
911 01:22:03,250 --> 01:22:05,240 我害怕 当重新睁开它们时 I feared, when opening them again,
912 01:22:05,350 --> 01:22:08,720 会看到那张所有人看到都要屈膝下跪的脸 to see the face before which every knee must bend.
913 01:22:10,590 --> 01:22:11,580 我看到了祂 I saw Him.
914 01:22:13,590 --> 01:22:17,190 那是一张毫无光泽的孩子的脸 It was a child's face, without the slightest radiance.
915 01:22:34,740 --> 01:22:37,770 我在池塘打了水 那水似乎比较让人放心 I filled it at the pond. It seemed safer
916 01:22:39,720 --> 01:22:41,950 他们全都在家 They're all there in the house.
917 01:22:42,690 --> 01:22:45,050 我是出来把奶牛们牵回厩的 I had gone out to bring the cows in.
918 01:22:46,520 --> 01:22:49,080 您不该让自己陷入这种状况！ You shouldn't let yourself get in such a state!
919 01:22:50,030 --> 01:22:51,620 幸好我发现了您 It's lucky I found you.
920 01:22:52,530 --> 01:22:54,720 我还以为您已经死了 I thought you were dead.
921 01:22:54,830 --> 01:22:58,130 - 我得起来 - 你现在这样是不能回家的 - I have to get up. - You can't go home looking like that.
922 01:22:58,570 --> 01:22:59,930 我怎么了？ What's wrong with me?
923 01:23:01,600 --> 01:23:03,270 你呕吐了 You've vomited.
924 01:23:03,470 --> 01:23:06,770 吐得满脸都是 就像吃了大量黑莓那样 It's smeared all over your face as if you'd been eating black berries.
925 01:23:21,830 --> 01:23:24,990 你在发抖 让我来吧 我习惯了 You're shaking. Let me do it. I'm used to it.
926 01:23:25,930 --> 01:23:29,660 哎呀呀 和我在上星期的婚宴上干的活一模一样！ My, my. Another thing entirely from last week at the wedding!
927 01:23:30,630 --> 01:23:33,300 明天到我的住所来 Come to the rectory tomorrow.
928 01:23:34,070 --> 01:23:35,470 我会解释清楚的 I'll explain.
929 01:23:35,570 --> 01:23:37,300 天呐 别了！ Heavens, no!
930 01:23:37,410 --> 01:23:40,140 我说了您太多坏话了 I've said too many awful things about you.
931 01:23:40,340 --> 01:23:41,970 糟糕的话 Terrible things.
932 01:23:45,420 --> 01:23:47,980 我知道您那么做并非故意 I know you didn't do this on purpose.
933 01:23:50,420 --> 01:23:52,750 也许有人在您的酒杯里放了些粉末 They probably put some powder in your glass.
934 01:23:53,220 --> 01:23:56,020 他们喜欢这样闹着玩 They do things like that for fun.
935 01:23:57,890 --> 01:24:02,060 不过幸好有我在 他们这回不会得逞了 But thanks to me, they won't have their fun this time.
936 01:24:09,910 --> 01:24:12,100 我会陪您走完这段路 I'll take you as far as the road.
937 01:24:50,180 --> 01:24:52,110 快回家吧 Hurry home now.
938 01:24:52,220 --> 01:24:55,780 我昨晚梦到您了 您看起来很可怜 I had a dream about you last night. You looked miserable.
939 01:24:56,250 --> 01:24:58,410 我哭着醒来的 I woke up crying.
940 01:25:26,220 --> 01:25:29,240 衣服变硬了 水也变成了红色 The cloth was stiff, and the water had turned red.
941 01:25:29,950 --> 01:25:32,420 我意识到我大量失血 I realized I'd lost a lot of blood.
942 01:25:36,390 --> 01:25:40,350 我非常吃惊 生怕死亡随之而至 I was so surprised - fear of death came only later -
943 01:25:41,130 --> 01:25:44,360 于是我决定乘一早的首班火车去里尔 that I decided to take the first train to Lille in the morning.
944 01:25:48,610 --> 01:25:51,400 公鸡打鸣时 我起床了 感觉不错 At the cock's crow, I woke feeling fine.
945 01:25:54,310 --> 01:25:57,580 又有点出血 更像是咳的 Another bit of hemorrhaging. More like spitting blood.
946 01:25:59,850 --> 01:26:01,540 惧怕死亡 Fear of death.
947 01:26:02,890 --> 01:26:06,790 我整个身体似乎围绕胸口中一个点颤动 真奇怪 Strange how my whole body seems to quiver around one point in my breast.
948 01:26:25,010 --> 01:26:27,600 黎明总是待我很好 Dawn is always so sweet to me.
949 01:26:28,680 --> 01:26:30,410 祝福所有的早晨！ Bless mornings!
950 01:26:31,850 --> 01:26:33,480 我的祈祷效果不错 I pray better.
951 01:27:11,450 --> 01:27:13,620 你明早要离开 我听说 You're going away tomorrow, I hear.
952 01:27:16,830 --> 01:27:17,950 是的 Yes.
953 01:27:19,400 --> 01:27:21,360 你还会回来吗？ Will you be coming back?
954 01:27:28,140 --> 01:27:29,570 看情况 That depends.
955 01:27:29,670 --> 01:27:32,370 情况……由你决定？ It depends... on you?
956 01:27:33,340 --> 01:27:35,940 由我去里尔看的医生决定 On the doctor I'm to see in Lille.
957 01:27:41,050 --> 01:27:43,140 我想…… I thought -
958 01:28:02,170 --> 01:28:04,160 那是奥利维耶的摩托车 That's Olivier's motorcycle.
959 01:28:05,910 --> 01:28:07,540 我的表兄 My cousin.
960 01:28:12,680 --> 01:28:14,380 给我搭把手 Help me
961 01:28:14,580 --> 01:28:16,380 既然你在这里…… as long as you're here -
962 01:28:16,590 --> 01:28:18,850 我该补充说 这违背了你父亲的意愿 against your father's will, I might add.
963 01:28:38,010 --> 01:28:39,940 你必然懂得留几手 You sure keep your cards hidden.
964 01:28:43,110 --> 01:28:45,410 我能问问你是怎么看待我的吗？ May I ask what you think of me?
965 01:28:47,180 --> 01:28:48,910 神父是没有个人见解的 A priest has no opinions.
966 01:28:52,190 --> 01:28:54,450 但你有眼有耳 You have eyes and ears
967 01:28:54,660 --> 01:28:57,130 也像其他人那样使用它们 我猜想 and make use of them like everyone else, I suppose.
968 01:28:58,190 --> 01:29:00,190 它们并没有告诉我关于你的任何事 They would tell me nothing about you.
969 01:29:05,370 --> 01:29:06,800 为什么没有？ Why not?
970 01:29:08,640 --> 01:29:11,200 你总是坐立不安 You're always restless,
971 01:29:11,940 --> 01:29:14,840 企图隐藏你灵魂的真面目 hoping to conceal the truth of your soul
972 01:29:15,480 --> 01:29:17,540 或者 可能企图忘却它 or perhaps to forget it.
973 01:29:18,820 --> 01:29:20,840 我不害怕真面目 I'm not afraid of the truth.
974 01:29:23,350 --> 01:29:25,250 你要是在刺激我…… And if you're daring me -
975 01:29:26,360 --> 01:29:28,290 我没有在刺激你 I'm not daring you.
976 01:29:29,160 --> 01:29:32,620 除非你面临死亡的威胁 我才会同意听你忏悔 I'd only agree to hear your confession if you were in danger of death.
977 01:29:34,730 --> 01:29:36,760 我希望 赦免将会适时到来 Absolution will come in due time, I hope,
978 01:29:37,030 --> 01:29:38,900 并且是来自别人之手 and from someone else's hand.
979 01:29:39,870 --> 01:29:42,100 这并不难预料 That wasn't hard to predict.
980 01:29:42,610 --> 01:29:45,200 父亲肯定会把你调走 Father will be sure to have you transferred.
981 01:29:46,440 --> 01:29:49,100 这儿所有人都认为你是酒鬼 Everyone here takes you for a drunkard.
982 01:30:45,900 --> 01:30:48,300 要是你知道我对生活的看法的话 If you only knew what I think of life.
983 01:30:50,910 --> 01:30:53,900 我是想拥有一切 想尝试一切的 I want everything. I'll try everything.
984 01:30:55,910 --> 01:30:59,940 我知道许多人到死都没能做到 I know plenty of others have died without managing to do that.
985 01:31:00,880 --> 01:31:02,940 如果生活要让我失望 那就随它吧 If life disappoints me, so be it.
986 01:31:03,150 --> 01:31:05,140 我会为了罪恶而罪恶 I will sin just for sin's sake.
987 01:31:10,090 --> 01:31:11,820 那正是你找到上帝的时候 That's the moment you'll find God.
988 01:31:12,130 --> 01:31:16,190 我想 怎么说呢 侮辱你！ I feel like - don't know - insulting you!
989 01:31:17,700 --> 01:31:20,460 你自认为能违背我的意愿来决定我的命运？ You think you can decide my fate against my will?
990 01:31:21,440 --> 01:31:23,500 如果我愿意 我会让自己下地狱 I'll damn myself if I please.
991 01:31:25,110 --> 01:31:27,300 我对你负责 灵魂对灵魂 I answer for you, soul for soul.
992 01:31:30,180 --> 01:31:32,770 你是不是随着什么幻想脱口而说？ Are you just saying whatever strikes your fancy?
993 01:31:38,550 --> 01:31:41,020 你和母亲说话时 我就在窗边 I was at the window when you spoke with Mother.
994 01:31:43,430 --> 01:31:45,830 突然之间 她的神情变得那么温和 All of a sudden, her expression became so gentle.
995 01:31:48,060 --> 01:31:51,000 我不信鬼魂 也不信奇迹 I don't believe in miracles any more than I do in ghosts,
996 01:31:51,130 --> 01:31:53,290 但我认为我是了解母亲的 but I think I knew my mother.
997 01:31:53,500 --> 01:31:56,630 她重视措辞就如鱼儿重视苹果 She cared for fine phrases like a fish cares for apples.
998 01:31:59,710 --> 01:32:01,680 你们之间有什么秘密吗？ Do you have some secret?
999 01:32:04,410 --> 01:32:06,210 (那是)一个失落的秘密 A lost secret.
1000 01:32:08,050 --> 01:32:10,750 你也将会发现它 然后又失去它 You too will find it and lose it in turn,
1001 01:32:11,850 --> 01:32:14,380 而其他人会在你之后将它传递下去 and others will pass it on after you.
1002 01:33:15,650 --> 01:33:17,120 神父 你到哪里去？ Where are you going, Father?
1003 01:33:17,320 --> 01:33:19,250 去马萨格 赶火车 To Mezargues, to catch the train.
1004 01:33:19,460 --> 01:33:22,320 以前坐过摩托车吗？想试试吗？ Ever ridden on one of these? Want to try?
1005 01:33:22,560 --> 01:33:24,190 来吧 Come on.
1006 01:33:47,720 --> 01:33:49,240 你没被吓到？ You're not frightened?
1007 01:33:51,220 --> 01:33:54,020 我当时何以感到奇迹般的年轻？ How could I feel so miraculously young then?
1008 01:33:54,220 --> 01:33:56,990 是的 就像我的同行者那么年轻 Yes, as young as my companion.
1009 01:33:58,060 --> 01:34:00,120 事情都突然间显得简单 Things suddenly seemed simple.
1010 01:34:00,330 --> 01:34:02,160 青春是有福的 Youth is blessed.
1011 01:34:02,370 --> 01:34:05,800 它是你承担的一种风险 甚至于这种风险也是有福的 It's a risk you take, and even that risk is blessed.
1012 01:34:06,970 --> 01:34:08,300 抓紧了！ Hold on!
1013 01:34:13,510 --> 01:34:15,530 因着一种无法言明的预感 By some premonition I can't explain,
1014 01:34:15,750 --> 01:34:19,370 我理解到上帝并不想让我 I understood that God didn't want me to die
1015 01:34:19,580 --> 01:34:21,570 在还未体味这种风险之前死去 without knowing something of this risk.
1016 01:34:21,780 --> 01:34:24,780 体味够了之后 我的献身时刻将至 献身也就得以成全 Just enough for my sacrifice to be complete when it's time came.
1017 01:34:32,460 --> 01:34:34,950 你要走了 真是可惜 我们本可再次如此畅游 Too bad you're leaving. We could have done this again.
1018 01:34:52,620 --> 01:34:55,380 我喜欢你 我们本可成为挚友 I like you. We could have been friends.
1019 01:34:57,350 --> 01:34:59,180 我 成为你的挚友？ Me, your friend?
1020 01:34:59,390 --> 01:35:00,860 当然 Of course.
1021 01:35:03,330 --> 01:35:05,950 我并非没有听说过关于你的事 Not that I haven't heard plenty about you.
1022 01:35:06,530 --> 01:35:09,560 舅舅认为你是个肮脏又无能的小神父 My uncle thinks you're a filthy, good-for-nothing little priest.
1023 01:35:11,800 --> 01:35:14,330 我不认为你会在意他的想法 I don't suppose you care what he thinks.
1024 01:35:17,770 --> 01:35:21,370 你大概不知道 我参加了外籍兵团 You probably don't know I'm in the Foreign Regiment.
1025 01:35:23,310 --> 01:35:24,340 兵团？ The Regiment?
1026 01:35:24,550 --> 01:35:26,040 军队的意思 The Legion, I mean.
1027 01:35:29,050 --> 01:35:31,920 要是你能看到自己的样子就好了 If you could only see yourself.
1028 01:35:32,020 --> 01:35:33,350 看到我自己？ See myself?
1029 01:35:33,560 --> 01:35:37,190 脱下那黑袍 你就跟我们一个样 Without that black robe, you'd look like any one of us.
1030 01:35:37,790 --> 01:35:39,850 我一眼就看出来了 I could see that right off the bat.
1031 01:35:41,630 --> 01:35:43,060 你不是这个意思 You don't mean it.
1032 01:35:43,270 --> 01:35:44,930 我正是这个意思 I certainly do.
1033 01:35:46,840 --> 01:35:48,390 什么？一个神父？ What? A priest?
1034 01:35:48,500 --> 01:35:50,670 外面有大量的神父 There are plenty of priests out there.
1035 01:35:51,070 --> 01:35:54,770 我的少校的勤务兵原来就是 我们只是后来才发现 My major's orderly was one. We only found out afterwards.
1036 01:35:56,050 --> 01:35:57,380 后来？ Afterwards?
1037 01:35:57,580 --> 01:35:59,100 在他阵亡之后 After his death.
1038 01:36:02,080 --> 01:36:03,920 他是怎么阵亡的？ How did he die?
1039 01:36:04,120 --> 01:36:06,520 在一头骡子上 像香肠一样挂着 On a mule, strung up like a sausage,
1040 01:36:06,720 --> 01:36:08,660 子弹穿过了他的肚子 a bullet through his belly.
1041 01:36:08,960 --> 01:36:10,760 我不是要问这个的 That's not what I meant.
1042 01:36:10,860 --> 01:36:13,120 听着 我不会对你撒谎的 Look, I won't lie to you.
1043 01:36:13,960 --> 01:36:16,630 这些家伙们在死前都喜欢炫耀一番 The guys like to show off when their time has come.
1044 01:36:16,970 --> 01:36:20,630 他们的一些说法 你也许会称之为亵渎 They have an expression or two you'd probably call blasphemy.
1045 01:36:21,270 --> 01:36:24,330 但如果上帝正因他们是士兵而没有拯救他们所有人 But if God doesn't save all soldiers precisely because they're soldiers,
1046 01:36:24,910 --> 01:36:27,000 那(崇敬)有何用处？ then what's the use?
1047 01:36:28,610 --> 01:36:31,770 多一句亵渎 才算得上足够 然后 "砰" One more blasphemy for good measure, and then... bam.
1048 01:36:32,410 --> 01:36:34,580 还是那句箴言 "要么全部 要么全无" It's always the same motto: "All or nothing."
1049 01:36:36,290 --> 01:36:37,840 我敢打赌 你自己也…… I bet you yourself -
1050 01:36:39,790 --> 01:36:43,950 知道吗 舅舅说你毫无社交技巧是对的 You know, my uncle's right when he says you have no social skills.
1051 01:36:46,930 --> 01:36:48,590 承认吧 我们的世界和他们的不一样 Admit it, our world isn't theirs.
1052 01:36:50,800 --> 01:36:52,600 我不排斥他们的 I don't reject theirs.
1053 01:36:52,800 --> 01:36:55,130 但他们的缺乏爱 But it lacks love.
1054 01:36:55,240 --> 01:36:57,470 在(爱)这件事上我们这些年轻人没有你的智慧 Our chaps don't have your wisdom in the matter.
1055 01:36:58,440 --> 01:37:01,100 他们眼中的上帝代表的是一种他们鄙视的正义 God seems to them to stand for a justice they despise -
1056 01:37:01,310 --> 01:37:03,240 一种没有荣誉可言的正义 a justice without honor.
1057 01:37:04,380 --> 01:37:07,980 而他们自己定的法则有需要付出很大代价的优点 极大的代价 Their own law has the merit of costing a lot, an awful lot.
1058 01:37:09,650 --> 01:37:12,090 好比一座祭献的圣坛 It's like a sacrificial altar.
1059 01:37:12,790 --> 01:37:15,150 然而它只是一块石头 不比任何其他石头大 Just a stone, no larger than any other.
1060 01:37:50,630 --> 01:37:53,960 拉维尼医生 医学院教授 DR. LAVIGNE PROFESSOR, FACULTY OF MEDICINE
1061 01:38:32,200 --> 01:38:34,640 我径直向车站走去 I walked straight ahead toward the station.
1062 01:38:50,390 --> 01:38:53,410 我进了一间老教堂 我甚至不知其名 I entered an old church. I didn't even know its name.
1063 01:39:05,370 --> 01:39:10,240 我从未对祈祷产生过如此剧烈的 生理上的厌恶 I'd never felt such a violent, physical revulsion to prayer.
1064 01:39:12,010 --> 01:39:14,310 在它面前 我的意志力很无能 My will was helpless in the face of it.
1065 01:39:44,070 --> 01:39:47,630 这样您就能安心写您的布道词了 This way you can go on quietly writing your sermon.
1066 01:39:56,490 --> 01:40:00,220 在我年轻时 神父们吃得可多了 When I was young, priests used to eat too much.
1067 01:40:00,520 --> 01:40:02,680 如今您却瘦得像流浪猫 Now you're as skinny as alley cats.
1068 01:40:04,090 --> 01:40:06,390 万事开头难 Beginnings are always hard.
1069 01:40:06,600 --> 01:40:10,330 别担心 您这个年纪 未来准有精彩的一生 Never mind. At your age you have your whole life before you.
1070 01:40:10,630 --> 01:40:14,160 我知道要保持镇定 我必须保持沉默 I knew to keep calm, I had to keep silent.
1071 01:40:26,380 --> 01:40:27,640 癌症 Cancer.
1072 01:40:29,020 --> 01:40:30,650 胃癌 Stomach cancer.
1073 01:40:32,020 --> 01:40:35,250 这些词回响于耳中 使大脑变空 The words had rung in my ears but left my mind empty.
1074 01:40:36,630 --> 01:40:39,190 我本以为是别的 肺结核 I had expected something else: tuberculosis.
1075 01:40:42,030 --> 01:40:46,130 估计我刚刚皱了眉 就像听到一个难题似的 I think I just frowned, like when hearing of a difficult problem.
1076 01:40:47,640 --> 01:40:51,130 过了好久我才意识到 It took me a long time to realize I was to die from a disease
1077 01:40:51,240 --> 01:40:54,230 我将要因一种我这年纪少见的疾病死去 that rarely strikes people of my age.
1078 01:41:18,270 --> 01:41:21,860 她送来一杯黑咖啡之后就离开了 She left me alone with a cup of black coffee.
1079 01:41:37,320 --> 01:41:40,760 我感觉良好 还打了个盹 I felt well and even fell asleep for an instant.
1080 01:41:50,630 --> 01:41:52,400 当我醒来时…… When I woke...
1081 01:41:52,900 --> 01:41:55,060 上帝 我必须将它写下来 God, I must write it down.
1082 01:42:11,520 --> 01:42:15,980 我想起这周的过去几个早晨 I think of my last few mornings this week,
1083 01:42:16,530 --> 01:42:19,360 想起鸡鸣 想起平静的窗子 of the cock's crow and my peaceful window.
1084 01:42:21,600 --> 01:42:24,070 它们多么清新 多么纯粹！ How fresh and pure it all was!
1085 01:42:41,250 --> 01:42:43,120 尽管我不断告诉自己 Even though I kept telling myself
1086 01:42:43,220 --> 01:42:45,690 过去几周 我的内在并没有发生任何变化 nothing had changed inside me over the last weeks,
1087 01:42:46,050 --> 01:42:51,520 但要带着这……东西……回家的想法让我羞愧 the idea of going home with this... thing... made me feel ashamed.
1088 01:43:36,970 --> 01:43:39,410 药物及相关产品 DRUGS AND SIMILAR PRODUCTS
1089 01:43:39,740 --> 01:43:42,610 杜福提修道院院长是我被派往小教区之前 Abbot Dufrety had studied with me at the seminary
1090 01:43:42,710 --> 01:43:44,870 在神学院的同窗 before being assigned to a small parish.
1091 01:43:46,080 --> 01:43:48,610 我知道他已从神职工作中 I knew he'd taken a leave from the ministry
1092 01:43:49,220 --> 01:43:51,520 请了病假 only because of illness.
1093 01:44:11,970 --> 01:44:14,100 他只穿了件衬衫 He was in shirtsleeves,
1094 01:44:14,410 --> 01:44:17,780 和我们穿在教士袍之下的棉裤 in those cotton pants we wear under our cassocks,
1095 01:44:17,880 --> 01:44:19,400 和光着脚穿拖鞋 and bare foot in his slippers.
1096 01:44:20,650 --> 01:44:23,580 你该早点通知我的 我在镇上有间办公室 You might have let me know. I have an office in town.
1097 01:44:24,890 --> 01:44:27,650 我只是偶尔住这儿 这地方太糟糕了 I only camp out here. The place is disgusting.
1098 01:44:43,040 --> 01:44:46,700 我理应多吃 但我没胃口 I'm supposed to eat a lot, but I don't have much appetite.
1099 01:44:47,540 --> 01:44:49,570 记得在神学院吃的豆子吗？ Remember those beans at the seminary?
1100 01:44:50,880 --> 01:44:53,750 最糟的是 要在这儿做饭 The worst is, the cooking has to be done right here.
1101 01:44:54,850 --> 01:44:57,750 我已经厌恶起油煎的气味了 I've taken a dislike to the smell of frying.
1102 01:44:59,890 --> 01:45:01,790 在任何别处 我都能狼吞虎咽 Anywhere else, I'd gobble up the stuff.
1103 01:45:06,330 --> 01:45:08,020 你来了真好 Nice of you to come.
1104 01:45:08,360 --> 01:45:10,460 老实说 我有点惊讶 Frankly, I'm a bit surprised.
1105 01:45:10,670 --> 01:45:13,760 往日的你有点小心眼 You used to be a bit narrow-minded in those days.
1106 01:45:17,170 --> 01:45:19,540 抱歉 我得去洗漱一下 Excuse me. I'll just clean up a bit.
1107 01:45:20,410 --> 01:45:23,280 我今天过得不错 这可不常有 I've had a good day, which doesn't happen often.
1108 01:45:23,810 --> 01:45:26,750 还能指望什么呢？积极的生活总是有益的 What do you expect? An active life is good for one.
1109 01:45:27,920 --> 01:45:30,180 但别以为我变成了粗鄙无知的人 But don't think I've turned into an ignoramus.
1110 01:45:30,790 --> 01:45:33,760 我贪婪地阅读 从来没读过这么多 I read voraciously. I've never read so much.
1111 01:45:34,890 --> 01:45:37,090 我这儿有些笔记 等会儿给你看 I've got some notes here. I'll show you.
1112 01:45:38,460 --> 01:45:41,990 希望你留下来吃个晚饭 我们能好好聊聊 I hope you'll stay for dinner. We can have a nice chat.
1113 01:45:44,970 --> 01:45:46,590 怎么了？ What's the matter?
1114 01:46:05,290 --> 01:46:06,810 来 喝了它 Here, drink this.
1115 01:46:12,360 --> 01:46:15,690 我们能指望什么？我们血管中都是腐败的血 What do you expect? We've got rotten blood in our veins.
1116 01:46:17,470 --> 01:46:21,630 一位医生曾对我说 "知识分子 从小营养不良！" A doctor told me once, "Intellectuals, undernourished since childhood!"
1117 01:46:23,110 --> 01:46:25,840 很说得通 你不觉得吗？ Explains a lot, don't you think?
1118 01:46:27,980 --> 01:46:30,310 别觉得我只是在为自己找借口 Don't think I'm just making excuses for myself.
1119 01:46:31,350 --> 01:46:33,340 我信奉彻底的坦诚 I believe in utter honesty,
1120 01:46:33,880 --> 01:46:36,040 无论对他人还是对自己 with others and with myself.
1121 01:46:39,920 --> 01:46:42,950 当我离开疗养院 我就想考验自己 When I left the sanatorium, I wanted to test myself.
1122 01:46:43,660 --> 01:46:45,630 我曾去找工作 I looked for a job.
1123 01:46:46,290 --> 01:46:49,420 这是一件关乎意志力与勇气的事 主要是勇气 It was a question of willpower and guts. Guts, mostly.
1124 01:46:50,100 --> 01:46:52,530 提醒你一下 我并不是要求别人跟我学 Mind you, I'm not telling anyone to follow me.
1125 01:46:52,730 --> 01:46:54,400 我经历过艰难时光 There are bad times.
1126 01:46:54,740 --> 01:46:57,930 要不是对某个为我奉献她的生命的人 And if it hadn't been for a feeling of responsibility

安徒生难道不比王尔德更感人？
